body:
Well I decided to make this post for people to share their records at anything on Avicus and you need evidence that you have achieved that or links . 
POST THEM BELOW AND ILL ADD THEM WHEN I HAVE SEEN EVIDENCE AND YOU CAN TRY AND BEAT THEM !

Comment Below If you have problems name or records are wrong!

RECORDS :

Awesomerp : 1020 Monuments in one month
_Sunny : First person to reach prestige 15
_Sunny : Person with the most kills 147,932 (Date: 17/03/2015)
zaidms0987 : Person with most deaths 74,888 (Date: 17/03/2015)
Peacheh :  112 days online (Date: 17/03/2015)
Peacheh: Sexiest admin? http://imgur.com/AcJgQmh
 resepignev : Filling a hole page of legit forum posts !
Emmaye : 384 kill streak in Quintus
Kycraft : 3661 Forum posts
99250 : Cheekyist Changing his name to PeachyYas
